casebody.data:
Supreme Court, Appellate Term, May, 1898.

Before Beekman, P. J., Gildersleeve and Giegerich, JJ.

Moritz Kugelman, Respondent, v. Rosa Hirschman et al. impleaded, etc., Appellants — Appealfrom an order of the General Term of the City Court affirming an order of Special Term, adjudging the de-' murrers interposed herein by the defendants to be frivolous and directing judgment for plaintiff thereon. Hays & Greenbaum, for Appellants; Gruber & Bonynge, for Respondent.

Judgment affirmed, with costs; no opinion.
